Trade/Device Name(s): FORA V10 No Code Blood Glucose Monitoring System, model TD-4244
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FORA V10 No Code Blood Glucose Monitoring System, model TD-4244
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA V10 No Code Blood Glucose Monitoring System, model TD-4244 for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various body sites for home monitoring of diabetes mellitus; not for diagnosis or use on neonates, intended for single patient use only.
